intro: Nintendo Switch™ exclusive! Survive on photorealistic gray sand dunes with tanks. Team up with allies to dominate vast battles and claim victory!
description:
A powerful tank unit amps up the excitement of battle! On the battlefield, allied tanks work alongside you to break through enemy lines, defend strategic locations, and deliver overwhelming firepower. Experience dynamic combat where infantry and tanks fight as one and enjoy a battlefield experience like never before. In a vast desert under the blazing sun, team up with your allies and tanks to enjoy strategic gameplay against a backdrop of hyper-realistic battlefields. Photorealistic graphics and 3D sound bring the tension of sandstorm-swept battlefields to life with stunning realism.

・Enjoy free-form tactics and exploration in a massive open field!
・Work alongside your tank unit! Allied tanks support your operations, bringing unmatched power and strategy to the battlefield.
・Ultra-high-definition graphics and 3D sound authentically recreate every detail, from grains of sand to gunshots, explosions, and the roar of tanks.
・Make use of the unique abilities and special weapons of four elite characters, as well as tank firepower, to complete missions with your team.
・With intuitive aiming and controls, both beginners and veterans can experience heart-pounding battles.
・Cooperate with AI teammates and tank units for tactical teamwork.
・Join the world’s top special forces and aim to complete the “Special Strike” mission.
・Experience overwhelming realism! 3D sound and a physics engine deliver dynamic, immersive gameplay.
・Breathtaking graphics capture the atmosphere of the battlefield with realistic lighting and shadows.
・Enjoy diverse tactics with four character classes: Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon.
・Face off against enemies and test your skills in Deathmatch mode.
・Dominate the battlefield and secure key positions in Domination mode.
・Engage in intense psychological warfare with bomb planting and defusing in Search & Destroy mode.
・Experience the ultimate in realistic shooting with precision aiming and an advanced tilt system.
・Feel the thrill of victory with teamwork-driven, adrenaline-pumping wins!

Stunning, photorealistic graphics bring battlefields swept by sandstorms to life. Work together with tanks and four elite characters, each with their own special weapons, to strategically pursue victory. Experience unparalleled immersion with diverse 3D effects and state-of-the-art graphics technology. Don't miss the ultimate single-player FPS, "Special Strike," where you'll fight alongside teammates on the most realistic battlefield ever!

Synopsis
Endless gray sand dunes stretch beneath a blazing sun in a vast desert where an ancient silence reigns. Deep underground rests a rare mineral capable of sparking the next energy revolution. Its crystal glows as if alive, and even a single fragment could power an entire city.

This energy source, long hidden, is discovered by Chronos Industry’s secret research team. Disguised as an ordinary IT company, Chronos seeks to monopolize the resource, amass wealth, and control the global economy. To achieve this goal, Chronos forms the elite "Shadow Legion," made up of former special forces, and begins mining operations.

Chronos's suspicious actions draw the attention of international intelligence agencies. Governments send their best special forces into the desert to uncover Chronos’s true goal and stop their plans. These operatives slip into sandstorms like shadows, aiming to sabotage Chronos’s mining operations and secure the energy source as a shared global asset. The Shadow Legion counters with advanced equipment, tactics, and a web of traps and surveillance. The battle for Chronos’s hidden energy begins, and, as a special forces member, you embark on the "Special Strike" mission that will decide the fate of the world.
